t:
I sat down on the dirty floor, holding the old diary in my lap. It looked really old, with a worn cover and yellowed, delicate pages. I started turning the pages carefully, they were torn and had holes from moths. The writing on them was faded and hard to read, and some parts I couldn't understand at all. But I could still make out a few things here and there. As I read the bits and pieces, memories from the past started coming back to me, like faint whispers from a long time ago.
                                                                 cont...
